chapter.pericope: The Glory of the Branch of Yahweh

ul.li1: 2On that day the branch of Yahweh shall become beautiful and glorious,
ul.li2: and the fruit of the land shall become the pride and glory of the survivorsHebrew “survivor” of Israel.
ul.li1: 3And this shall happen: He who is left in Zion
ul.li2: and he who remains in Jerusalem will be called holy,
ul.li3: everyone written for life in Jerusalem,
ul.li1: 4when the Lord has washed away the filth of the daughters of Zion
ul.li2: and cleansed the blood of Jerusalem from her midst
and by a spirit of burning.
ul.li1: 5Then Yahweh will create over all of the siteOr “place” of Mount ZionLiterally “the mountain of Zion”
ul.li2: and over her assembly a cloud by day
and smoke and the brightness of flaming fire by night.
ul.li1: Indeed, over all the glory there will be a canopy,
ul.li2: 6and it will be a shelter for shade from the heat by day,
and a refuge and a hiding place from rainstorm and from rain.
